title: Stone Butch Blues
description: A free PDF copy of this book is available at the author's website.Woman or man? This internationally acclaimed novel looks at the world through the eyes of Jess Goldberg, a masculine girl growing up in the "Ozzie and Harriet" McCarthy era and coming out as a young butch lesbian in the pre-Stonewall gay drag bars of a blue-collar town.Stone Butch Blues traces a propulsive journey, powerfully evoking history and politics while portraying an extraordinary protagonist full of longing, vulnerability, and working-class grit. This once-underground classic takes the reader on a roller-coaster ride of gender transformation and exploration and ultimately speaks to the heart of anyone who has ever suffered or gloried in being different.Dear Reader:I want to let you know that Stone Butch Blues is an anti-oppression/s novel.As a result, it contains scenes of rape and other violence.None of this violence is gratuitous or salacious.Leslie
author: Leslie Feinberg
